text: "Speedway" is a song first recorded by Elvis Presley as part of the soundtrack for his 1968 motion picture Speedway. Its first release on record was in 1968 on the soundtrack album Speedway. == Writing and recording == The song was written by Mel Glazer and Stephen Schlaks. Presley recorded it on June 20, 1967 at the soundtrack recordings for the MGM movie Speedway (that took place June 20–21, 1967 at the MGM Studios in Hollywood, California.) == References == == External links == * Category:1968 songs Category:Elvis Presley songs Category:Songs written for films
